name: Anew
description:
Created in a weekend for Guildford Game Jam 2020.

Every 5 million years, all advanced life in the galaxy must be culled. And it's been 5 million years... draw vector fields to direct an invading drone swarm to destroy all planets and ships.

Code, design, visuals: Bogdan Vera

Audio: Ryan Milford https://sharkhat.itch.io/

Assets used:

Space Star Field Backgrounds by Dilapidated Meow (free on Unity store)

Black hole png  (random swirly thing I found on google images) https://bit.ly/3f2zhiD

Textures of Earth and Mars from NASA.
